channel.title: Looking for some "real world" testing
channel.description:
Hello,
since some weeks I am working on my product and I am quite happy with the progress - not too much of development and focusing on copy and marketing. Well nothing is perfect but I guess thats ok.
Now I would like to let some beta users using the product and was wondering if some here would like to be one of them? Ideally you have a website running that has some kind of medium/long html form i.e. like a registration form on it.
http://www.formrescue.com/
If you are interested please send my a message or comment.
Cheers, Alex
